# Contents

```{r include=FALSE, warnings = FALSE, message = FALSE, echo = FALSE, output = "asis"}
dirs <- list.dirs(here::here("docs"), recursive = F)
base_dirs <- basename(dirs)

make_links <- function(x){
  cat(paste0("- [", x, "](", x, "/", x,".html)\n"))
}

for(i in base_dirs){
  make_links(i)
}

```
